Question
========

Suppose it is given that for a given patient population, the haemoglobin (Hb) level is normally distributed with μ = 8.10 and σ = 1.20. We randomly draw an individual from this population. What is the probability of an Hb of more than 7.50 ?

Answerlist
----------

* 19.15%
* 30.85%
* 69.15%
* 80.85%

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 19.15%: Incorrect
* 30.85%: Incorrect
* 69.15%: Correct
* 80.85%: Incorrect
